title: Asking what time the main band plays
context: Ask the venue staff when the headliner will go on stage.

content.bestLine: What time does the headliner go on stage?

neutral.text: When does the main band play?
What's the schedule for the headliner?
Can you tell me when the main act starts?
What time is the headlining performance?
When should I expect the main band to play?
Do you know the set time for the headliner?
What's the timing for the main concert?
Can I get the schedule for tonight's show?

informal.text: What time does the band go on?
Got a set time for the headliner?
What's the deal with the headliner's start time?
When does the concert actually start?
How much longer till the main band plays?

formal.text: Could you please inform me of the headliner's start time?
I would appreciate knowing when the main band is scheduled to play.
What is the designated time for the headlining performance?
Could you provide me with the evening's performance schedule?
I am wondering if you could tell me when the main concert begins.
What time is the headliner expected to take the stage?

patterns.meaning: Asking for the performance time of a specific act
Inquiring about the timing of a particular event or performance

dialogs.description: Asking venue staff about the headliner's playtime

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Excuse me, what time does the headliner go on stage?

lines.speaker: Staff
lines.text: The main band is scheduled to play at 9 PM.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Can you tell me when the main act starts?

lines.speaker: Staff
lines.text: Yes, the headliner is set to perform at 10:30 PM. There are a couple of opening acts before that.
